>
[Scale of Igroon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2365)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 180 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Carved from a scale of the [kaiju](/Traits.aspx?ID=383) Igroon, this jagged shield refracts light around it in a shimmering haze. A _scale of Igroon_ (Hardness 20, HP 160, BT 80) recovers 4 Hit Points at the start of its wielder's turn. When you [Raise a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98), you can use the [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) reaction with the scale of Igroon to block an attack or effect that deals acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, or sonic damage as well as physical damage.

<document level="2" id="action-1933" />

<document level="2" id="action-1934" />

<document level="2" id="action-1935" />

**Destruction** If a deity, kaiju, spawn of a deity, titan, or being of similar power stomps on a _scale of Igroon_ while in absolute darkness, the shield is destroyed permanently.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
